toml-to-json.cardDescription: Convert TOML format to JSON format. Paste your TOML and get the JSON output.
toml-to-json.cardInputDescription: Paste the TOML you want to convert. We will validate it and then generate the JSON output.
toml-to-json.cardOutputDescription: This is the JSON representation of your TOML. You can copy it for further use.
toml-to-json.outputError: Invalid TOML format. Please check your input.
